title: Sickle of BOOOAL
content:
Notes & Tips

Rarity: Rare Value: 150 Gp. Weight: 1 Kg. BOOOAL's Benediction: Advantage when attacking Bleeding targets. ID: UNI_SickleOfBOOOAL

Weapons Adamantine Longsword ♦ Adamantine Mace ♦ Adamantine Scimitar ♦ Air Myrmidon Flail ♦ Allandra's Whelm ♦ Ambusher ♦ Arcane Absorption Dagger ♦ Arduos Flame Blade ♦ Artificial Leech ♦ Assassin's Shortsword ♦ Assassin's Touch ♦ Balduran's Giantslayer ♦ Battle-Worn Blade ♦ Battleaxe ♦ Battleaxe +1 ♦ Battleaxe +2 ♦ Belm ♦ Bigboy's Chew Toy ♦ Blackguar
